The poc/sandbox environment is a finely crafted home for all your prototypes. It's built using the same stack that powers directv.com/entertainment.

Sandbox Setup

First checkout dtv-poc in stash.

  git clone http://YOUR_DTV_USER_ID@stash.directv.com:8080/scm/dot/dtv-poc.git

Go into the folder

  cd dtv-poc

Checkout dtv-app-framework

  git clone http://YOUR_DTV_USER_ID@stash.directv.com:8080/scm/dot/dtv-app-framework.git

After you've cloned dtvAppFramework rename the folder dtv-app-framework to lib.

Copy /lib/grunt/package.json to /

You should now have a poc.package.json and a package.json in you root directory.

Next your going to install all the npm dependecies by running npm install

Setup Yeoman

We've built a yeoman generator that makes it easy to create prototypes. Let's set that up! (Make sure you install yeoman globally!)

Paste this in terminal:

  cd yo/generator-proto && npm install && npm link && cd ../../

Using Yeoman

The yeoman generator is a small utility that scaffolds out a project for you. Let's create one. Paste below into terminal.

  yo proto

If you've setup yeoman correctly you should see a prompt in terminal that says:

  What's your projects name?

Im going to call this project Smart Water. Type your project name in terminal and hit enter.

The next prompt is going to ask you which folder you want to create your project in? prototype is the root. To keep things organized im going to create a project in the users folder. Im going to select the option prototype/users.

After you select the users folder the next prompt asks:

  Create a new directory inside prototype/users ?

This maybe seem a bit confusing, but it's asking you if you want to create a New Folder inside prototype/users. I'm going to type y in terminal and hit enter because I want to create a folder inside prototype/users called shaneal that Smart Water will go inside of. Hopefully that makes sense...

The next promt is going to ask you to type the name of your folder. In my case it's going to be shaneal.

Yeoman will create my project(Smart Water) inside prototype/users/shaneal/smart-water. Nifty!

The next 2 promts will ask if you want to include the DIRECTV Header & Footer.

The last prompt will ask you to choose which templating engine you would like to use. The options are jade or ejs.


Happy Coding!
